content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (no other drills found) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of 
- Steam engine(position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Boiler(position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Offshore pump(position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Pipe group(position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- Pipe group(position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of 
- Transport belt(position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt(position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
- Belt group(position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have fuel before starting operations.
- Ensure that boilers have fuel to generate steam for steam engines.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network.
- Ensure that pipe groups are connected to boilers and steam engines.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients or source items
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients to smelt.
- Ensure that burner inserters have source items to insert.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No variables have been assigned.
